name: Dance Shred GO
description:
Controls

  • Move Left / Right - A&D or Arrow Keys
  • Switch Dance Moves - 1, 2, 3, and 4 keys

Switch to the dance of the oncoming lane, and dance in that lane to increase your score multiplier. If you miss a lane, your multiplier resets. Hitting a stop sign resets the game. Highscore is local
